title: Espresso Classic
description: Strong and aromatic espresso made from premium Arabica beans, perfect for a quick energy boost.

title: Cappuccino Delight
description: Creamy cappuccino with a perfect balance of espresso, steamed milk, and foam, topped with cocoa powder.

title: Iced Caramel Latte
description: Refreshing cold latte with rich espresso, milk, and sweet caramel syrup over ice.

title: Mocha Chocolate
description: Delicious combination of espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate, topped with whipped cream.

title: Vanilla Latte
description: Smooth latte infused with sweet vanilla flavor, perfect for those who enjoy a subtle sweetness.

title: Cold Brew
description: Smooth and less acidic coffee brewed slowly in cold water for 12 hours, served over ice.
